DOC.brief_summary: In study , set confirm reliability epidural waveform analysis ( EWA ) adjunct loss resistance obstetrical epidural block .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Waveform Analysis Adjunct Loss Resistance Obstetrical Epidural Blocks
DOC.detailed_description: After loss resistance , 5 mL normal saline inject epidural needle ; latter connect pressure transducer ( leveled heart ) use rigid tubing . A pressure record epidural waveform save future assessment blind observer . After record waveform , rigid tubing disconnect epidural needle . A 4 mL bolus lidocaine 2 % epinephrine 5 µg/mL inject latter . An epidural catheter advance 3-4 cm past tip needle inside epidural space . The needle remove catheter secure skin usual fashion . Fifteen minute injection local anesthetic bolus , blind observer apply ice T1-L5 dermatome assess epidural block .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists classification 13 adult unable give consent coagulopathy ( assessed history physical examination , deem clinically necessary , blood work ie platelet ≤ 100 , International Normalized Ratio ≥ 1.4 prothrombin time ≥ 50 ) renal failure ( assessed history physical examination , deem clinically necessary , blood work ie creatinine ≥ 100 ) hepatic failure ( assessed history physical examination , deem clinically necessary , blood work ie transaminases ≥ 100 ) allergy local anesthetic prior surgery lumbar spine
